LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMaxTemperature: Set the maximum comfortable temperature for this animal. Be careful! Setting the temperature too low can result in instant heatstroke!
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMinMaxTemperature: Set the lowest allowed maximum comfortable temperature for all animals. Be careful! Setting the temperature too low can result in instant heatstroke!
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMaxMaxTemperature: Set the highest allowed maximum comfortable temperature for all animals. Be careful! Setting the temperature too high can result in instant hypothermia!
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMinTemperature: Set the minimum comfortable temperature for this animal. Be careful! Setting the temperature too high can result in instant hypothermia!
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMinMinTemperature: Set the lowest allowed minimum comfortable temperature for all animals. Be careful! Setting the temperature too low can result in instant heatstroke!
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMaxMinTemperature: Set the highest allowed minimum comfortable temperature for all animals. Be careful! Setting the temperature too high can result in instant hypothermia!
